name: A Crooked Gambler
description:
GMTK Game Jam Entry by Team Subpixel

"They let the dice roll, and I nudged 'em just right."

You play as Tony Robinson, ex hired muscle for a crime family who now has to pay back his debt the only way he can; Cheating at a casino!

Team Subpixel is:
- Ragnarockerbunny - Programming and Coordination
ragnarockerbunny - itch.io
- Robin Hintzen - Composition

- Tawfeeq Irshaidat - Programming
